name: Cira and The Lost Amulet
description:
A small Adventure/Story game that I made for a school project. This is my first game so it is just a prologue but hopefully if I have time I will continue working on it and make a full game. :) 

So, If you like this game, please donate and comment! :D So I can know if you want a longer and more intense/developed game with added story, fighting and of course more content in general. 

Thank you for playing my short game and hopefully you enjoy it! ^_^

Story: Cira is living a normal life at home, where nothing unexpected ever happens. One day everything changes and Cira has to figure out who she really is. 

P.S. a little tip for the looking for the amulet part. Try checking behind the trees in the forest ^_^
